text: Riddick Lamont Bowe (born August 10, 1967) is an American amateur boxer. He won a Silver medal at the 1988 Summer Olympics. He later became a Heavyweight professional boxer. He defeated other boxers like Evander Holyfield and Andrew Golota. The latter was disqualified for giving too many low blows to Bowe in 1996. Bowe was born in Brooklyn, New York City. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:African-American boxers Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Medalists at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Brooklyn
